sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import PageTItle from "../../layouts/PageTitle"; import userImg from '../../../images/avatar/8.jpg' import axios from 'axios'; const NewClientForm=()=>{ const [data,setData] = React.useState({name:'',routine:'',startDate:'',endDate:''}); const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.target.preventDefault; if(data.name && data.routine && data.startDate && data.endDate) { axios.post('https://fitnessapp-607ec-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/Clients.json',JSON.stringify(data)) .then((res)=>{ alert('submit successfully....'); setData({name:'',routine:'',startDate:'',endDate:''}); }) .catch((err)=>alert(err)); }else{ alert('Kindly fill the form properly'); } } return(

Here is a brief overview of activities from your clients.

e.preventDefault()}>

Name

setData({...data,name:e.target.value})} className="form-control input-default input-border " placeholder="enter name" />

Routine

setData({...data,routine:e.target.value})} className="form-control input-default input-border" placeholder="routine name" />

Start Date

setData({...data,startDate:e.target.value})} className="form-control input-default input-border" placeholder="start date" />

End Date

setData({...data,endDate:e.target.value})} className="form-control input-default input-border" placeholder="end date" />

Objective

Lose Body Fat

72%

Statistics

) } export default NewClientForm;
